      Classes in org.apache.wayang.core.platform that implement JsonSerializer 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      static class  AtomicExecution.KeyOrLoadSerializer
      This JsonSerializer stores the given instances via their Configuration key, if any, or else by the LoadProfile that they estimate.

      Fields in org.apache.wayang.core.platform declared as JsonSerializer 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      static JsonSerializer<Platform> Platform.jsonSerializer
      Default JsonSerializer implementation that stores the Class of the instance and then tries to deserialize by invoking the static getInstance() method.
